topics.body:
I just finished half of my exams and my History papers (which was the one I studied for a month straight).

Now I'm gonna take a break for a day or two.

So, has anyone had that moment where you're part of a silent group and suddenly, you laughed for no apparent reason and then everyone laughed as well? No reason at all.
